name: TubeMogul
short_description:
TubeMogul is an enterprise software company for digital branding. Brands use the
TubeMogul Platform to execute their global video ad spend.
long_description:
TubeMogul is the leading enterprise software company for digital branding. The
world’s largest brands and agencies unify their video advertising on TubeMogul’s
programmatic platform. By using a single, integrated solution, TubeMogul’s
clients gain control over their video spend, simplify their workflow and verify
the success of their campaigns. Founded in 2006, TubeMogul is based in
Emeryville, California with offices across North America, Europe, Asia and
Australia.
